programme.title: It Should Happen to You
programme.desc: A publicity-seeking actress with an urge to be famous comes up with a plan to make a name for herself. She rents a billboard in New York with her name and picture on it, and soon becomes an overnight sensation - despite not actually being famous for anything. Meanwhile, a wealthy playboy becomes infatuated with her, to the consternation of her film-maker boyfriend. Comedy, starring Judy Holliday, Peter Lawford and Jack Lemmon in his screen debut

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and company try to take Broadway by storm with their college show, setting the stage for a host of misadventures as they yearn for stardom in the Big Apple and set out to raise the money to finance their production. Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: A young womans chaotic life becomes more complicated when she inherits her grandmothers dog. Comedy, starring Beattie Edmondson, Ed Skrein, Jennifer Saunders and Cherie Lunghi

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier agrees to testify against her gangster boyfriend after witnessing a murder. Placed in protective custody by the authorities, she is less than pleased to discover she is expected to pose as chaste nun Sister Mary Clarence in a convent. Comedy, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Harvey Keitel, Maggie Smith, Bill Nunn and Kathy Najimy

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: A cabaret singer who once hid out in a convent is reunited with the nuns she befriended, who now need her help. She poses as a member of the order once more and joins the staff of a Catholic school threatened with closure, where she aims to make a success of the resident choir. Comedy sequel, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Najimy, Lauryn Hill, Maggie Smith and James Coburn

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Motorcycle stuntman Johnny Blaze sells his soul to diabolical Mephistopheles to save the life of his father. His bargain dooms him to pass each night as Ghost Rider, a demonic skeletal biker bound to take evil souls to Hell. However, conflict between Mephistopheles and his son offers Johnny the chance to win back his humanity. Fantasy thriller based on the comic-book, starring Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes and Wes Bentley

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: An orphaned settler in North America is adopted by the last member of a native tribe following the death of his family. The child grows to become legendary frontiersman Hawkeye, who rescues and falls in love with a British officers daughter during the Anglo-French War. However, a bitter Huron war chief is determined to take revenge against her father by killing her. Michael Manns historical adventure, based on James Fenimore Coopers classic tale, starring Daniel Day-Lewis, Madeleine Stowe, Russell Means, Wes Studi, Maurice Roeves and Eric Schweig

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A submarine captain working for a salvage company is laid off, and attempts to turn his fortunes around by recovering a lost treasure rumoured to have sunk to the depths of the Black Sea. However, greed, desperation and claustrophobia cause the members of his crew to turn against each other. Thriller, starring Jude Law and Jodie Whittaker

programme.title: LumoTV:: Deaf Funny
programme.desc: Lumotv: Deaf Funny

programme.title: Time Lock
programme.desc: A boy manages to get himself locked in a bank vault. With 63 hours before the device opens, the authorities are left facing a race against time to free the lad before he runs out of air. Thriller, starring Robert Beatty, Betty McDowall, Vincent Winter, Lee Patterson and a young Sean Connery in an early role

programme.title: The Sound Barrier
programme.desc: An aircraft manufacturer risks alienating his friends and family in a single-minded attempt to prove planes can exceed the speed of sound. David Leans drama, written by Terence Rattigan and starring Ralph Richardson, Ann Todd, Nigel Patrick, Dinah Sheridan and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Outcast of the Islands
programme.desc: A clerk in a South Seas trading post is sacked after being accused of stealing. After faking his suicide, he reacquaints himself with the trading ship captain who befriended him as a 12-year-old boy. The seafarer agrees to help him regain his reputation, but his trust is soon exploited. Drama, starring Ralph Richardson and Trevor Howard

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: The ragtag soldiers of the Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard are given the chance to prove their mettle by apprehending three German aviators who have parachuted into the country in the vanguard of a suspected Nazi invasion. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Arthur Lowe, John Le Mesurier, Clive Dunn, Bill Pertwee, Ian Lavender and Arnold Ridley

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: A father brings up his baby girl as a single dad after the unexpected death of his wife who died a day after their daughters birth. Comedy drama, starring Kevin Hart and Alfre Woodard

programme.title: Free Guy
programme.desc: Guy lives a fairly monotonous life as a bank employee. That is until he meets the girl of his dreams and realises hes an NPC within a massive open world video game. Does he deviate from the life hes always lived or does he follow his dream girl into the unknown future? Adventure comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Jodie Comer, Taika Waititi and Lil Rel Howery

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: A CIA agent is accused of being a sleeper assassin with a deadly purpose - to kill the Russian president during a diplomatic visit and start a third world war. She goes on the run, with her colleagues in hot pursuit - but each attempt to prove her innocence only raises more questions about her identity. Action thriller, starring Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber and Chiwetel Ejiofor. In English, and Russian and Korean with English subtitles

programme.title: My Friend Dahmer
programme.desc: The early years of Ohio serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer are charted in this drama inspired by his friend Derf Backderfs graphic novel, starring Ross Lynch, Anne Heche and Alex Wolff

Although the new arrival soon wins over the locals, an embittered man consumed by hatred for his missing father is suspicious of him. Western, starring John Wayne, Harry Carey and Betty Field

programme.title: Winchester 73
programme.desc: A gunslinger tracks down his fathers killer, but is unable to exact his revenge because the sheriff of the town makes a point of confiscating all firearms. Instead he challenges him to compete in a shooting competition to win a superb rifle, but when the murderer loses, he steals the coveted prize. Western, starring James Stewart, Shelley Winters, Dan Duryea and Stephen McNally

programme.title: Bandolero!
programme.desc: An outlaw due to be hanged is rescued at the last minute by his brother, and together they go on the run with a hostage, hotly pursued by the local sheriff. As the fugitives contemplate giving up a life of crime, they face a dangerous run-in with a gang of Mexican bandits. Western, starring James Stewart, Dean Martin, Raquel Welch and George Kennedy

programme.desc: Preparations are under way for Roses wedding, but family tensions on both sides threaten to derail proceedings. Denker reveals an unexpected side to her personality, which causes trouble for more than one of the servants. With the war memorial due to be unveiled, Mrs Patmore is still upset, but Robert has something up his sleeve. Branson comes to a heart-wrenching decision, and the storm clouds that have been gathering over Anna and Bates finally burst

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Its the early autumn of 1924 and Roses father-in-law Lord Sinderby has rented Brancaster Castle in Northumberland and invited the Crawleys to a grouse-shooting party. However, the Sinderbys butler Stowell (guest star Alun Armstrong, New Tricks) has an axe to grind and a scandalous secret threatens to derail the holiday. Back at Downton, the servants hold the fort and unlikely later-life romances abound, while Bates takes drastic measures to clear Annas name as she faces an uncertain future behind bars. The seasons change and another Christmas is enjoyed at the Abbey, where a heartbreaking farewell and a joyful reunion take place. Feature-length festive special, starring Hugh Bonneville, Maggie Smith, James Faulkner, Penny Downie, Joanne Froggatt and Brendan Coyle

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Marys past catches up with her when an unwelcome visitor delivers an ultimatum, as secrets and rifts threaten the unity of the family. programme.desc: Plans for the wedding are gathering steam, but Lady Marys meddling lands Carson in trouble with Mrs Hughes. programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE

programme.desc: At Château Lagorce, Edward undertakes a tricky project to rebuild some rotten shutters that feature prominently in wedding photographs. programme.title: Chateau DIY

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Property manager Shelley and electrical supervisor David have six months to transform a beautiful canal-side terrace in Burscough, Ormskirk, into a family home. However, with a tight budget and house prices tumbling, the possibility of making any profit looks far from being guaranteed. Presented by Tayo Oguntonade, Simon OBrien and Carys Davies

However, they cant decide on where it should be. Joe wants to return to his Yorkshire roots while Di wants to buy in Normandy France. With a budget of £140,000 Jasmine Harman shows them three fantastic properties in West Yorkshire, while Jonnie Irwin tries to tempt them with three French homes

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Flamboyant 49-year-old performing arts teacher Helen gets the party started in Sheffield. Her cooking doesnt go to plan, but she certainly delivers on the entertainment, on a whirlwind evening featuring trumping, spies and a dessert that goes with a bang

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Design and technology teacher Claire hosts the second day of the competition in Sheffield, and hopes her Asian-inspired menu with a spot of clay model-making will impress her fellow diners enough to net her the points shell need to secure the cash prize. programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

As the students tackle the longest and most technical section of the advanced phase, they know its a test they must pass to keep their dreams alive. The pressure mounts on some struggling students, and the commanding officer issues a timely warning to one

programme.title: Miracle Landing on the Hudson
programme.desc: Documentary charting how US Airways Flight 1549 was forced to land on New Yorks Hudson River in 2009 when a flock of geese flew into both of the planes engines. The impact of the landing ripped a hole in the bottom of the aircraft, and water began to rise in the cabin. Includes interviews with passengers, who reflect on the heroism of the pilot, and the efforts of local boat owners to rescue them from the icy waters

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: The case of a plane that flew into a massive storm over Indonesia during the countrys rainy season, but made a seemingly impossible emergency landing with only one casualty

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Aviation experts contemplate the possibility that airlines could be putting lives at risk by using out-of-date statistics to calculate passengers average weight

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Asbestos was a product that seemed too good to be true - because it was. Meanwhile, in New York, two buildings explode sending debris flying through the streets

programme.title: Hidden Histories
programme.desc: Historian James Holland explores key events of the Second World War, beginning with the battle of Monte Cassino, where Polish troops displaced by the Nazi and Soviet invasions of their homeland marched south to take a position that had defied all Allied offensives for the previous four months

programme.title: Tuts Treasures: Hidden Secrets
programme.desc: King Tuts death mask undergoes a forensic investigation as experts seek an answer to one of the biggest mysteries surrounding the famous treasure

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Archaeologists explore the final days of the pharaohs, revealing how power struggles influenced the fate of one of the worlds greatest civilisations

programme.title: Hitler Youth
programme.desc: Part one of two. The story of the Nazi youth organisation, which was used to indoctrinate German boys in the 1930s and prepare them for the war Hitler was planning

programme.title: Hitler Youth
programme.desc: Part two of two. A look at the expansion of the organisation in the build-up to war, and the efforts of the Allies to counter the indoctrination of captured Nazi soldiers

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures
programme.desc: Compilation of highlights concerned with the machinery of air warfare, including bombs, torpedoes and kamikaze planes

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana Van Zeller
programme.desc: The reporter travels to the Amazon to track down the criminal networks behind a slew of killings and the illegal destruction of the rainforest

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana Van Zeller
programme.desc: As much as 30 percent of our seafood has been caught illegally. Mariana searches for the fish pirates who make billions each year while destroying our oceans

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Hannah decodes the Parthenons geometry, sails the Aegean with ancient tools, and attends a flour-throwing festival that blends ancient myth with modern identity

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.sub-title: Bog Body, Abrams Machine, Bust of Nefertiti
programme.desc: A body found perfectly preserved in a Danish bog, a bust of Nefertiti, and a strange machine used to identify disease

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Reconstructing the landing at sea of a passenger jet flying from Italy to Tunisia in 2005, which was forced to ditch after successive engine failures. Miraculously there were survivors, and the investigation that followed led to criminal charges against nine men for criminal negligence

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: The events in 1987 that caused a flight leaving Detroit to crash onto a road during take-off, killing all but one of its passengers

programme.title: Megafactories
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at an American crisp factory, following workers during the build-up to the 4th of July celebrations, when the plant uses a million pounds of potatoes a day

programme.title: Chris Hemsworth: A Road Trip To Remember
programme.desc: The actor goes on a road trip with his father, who has recently been diagnosed with Alzheimers, hoping to rekindle forgotten memories

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: A plane bursts into flames just after landing in Japan, and while none of the crew or passengers are killed, investigators have a hard time finding out what went wrong

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation: Special Report
programme.desc: Crashes involving high-profile passengers, including a Brazilian football team, a diplomat on a secret mission, and an American VIP lost over war-torn Croatia

programme.title: Inside Airport Lost and Found
programme.sub-title: A Wedding Watch and a Weighty Wallet
programme.desc: Airport workers reunite travellers with their missing items, including a sentimental 40th anniversary gift and a wallet with $1500

programme.title: Colossal Machines
programme.desc: Machines designed to operate in extremes of cold weather, including snow ploughs, all-terrain vehicles, ice breakers and trains running through icy regions

programme.title: Hitler the Junkie
programme.desc: An expose of the medications Adolf Hitler was taking, how much he took and how often, and whether drugs played a role in the Fuhrers behaviour and actions

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures
programme.desc: The German armys surprise attack in the Ardennes as the tide of the war turned, designed to divide Allied forces and resulting in some of the worst war crimes of the conflict

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Ruins of ancient civilisations in the Mediterranean, examining relics of the Minoans, the Greeks, the Carthaginians and the Romans to determine how these societies collapsed

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: The 10 most perilous expeditions in history, from the disappearance of Amelia Earhart, attempts to summit Everest, and the Lost City of Z

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: An examination of the series of blunders and oversights that led to the tragic Chernobyl disaster in 1986, the consequences of which are still evident today, both in the evacuated exclusion zone and beyond

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: When a turboprop crashes in Papua New Guinea, investigators uncover a deadly flaw in an aircraft used all around the world

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Over 70 million people around the world claim Irish heritage. Hannah goes beyond the pubs and parades to discover what it really means to be Irish today

programme.title: Chris Hemsworth: A Road Trip To Remember
programme.desc: The actor goes on a road trip with his father, who has recently been diagnosed with Alzheimers, hoping to rekindle forgotten memories

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Bjoern plans a high-risk rescue when an overturned tanker blocks the road. He needs Thords help, but hes challenged to raise a boat thats sunk into the fjord

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: An American plane crash in the last days of the Vietnam War in 1974 that killed more than 250 people, including Vietnamese orphans being airlifted to safety. Investigators had to battle looters in order to safeguard the wreckage, hoping to determine the cause of the disaster

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend travel to Northern Ireland to rescue Noels Japanese gem - a 1972 Toyota Celica - a super chilled coupe that creates a bit of a bang. However, the car is now so rare, spare parts are almost impossible to find

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: With all the emergency agencies involved in a simulated plane crash exercise, real problems place airport operations in jeopardy

programme.title: Bid and Destroy
programme.desc: After dangerously undercutting its rivals at auction, the Danley Demolition team tries to salvage valuables from an old boarding house

programme.title: Abandoned
programme.desc: Jay makes a big find under a pile of rubble in an 18th-century mill, including a set of antique tiles with an estimated value of $140 each

programme.title: Abandoned

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: The wise-cracking blue hedgehog, made famous by a series of popular video games on Sega consoles, continues his computer-animated adventures through the Shatterverse. At the end of the first series, the eponymous spiny mammal (voiced by Deven Mack) learnt from black hedgehog Shadow (Ian Hanlin) that the original version of Green Hill no longer exists. Sonic is trapped in a multiverse of mayhem with different iterations of his friends Amy Rose (Shannon Chan-Kent), Knuckles (Adam Nurada), Rouge (Kazumi Evans) and Tails (Ashleigh Ball). Sonic and Shadow must put aside their differences and work together to repair the temporal damage and outwit diabolical scientist Dr Eggman (Brian Drummond)

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The heroes in a half shell come to terms with their new roles as saviours of New York City in an animated series set shortly after the events chronicled in the film Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem. Donatello (voiced by Micah Abbey), Leonardo (Nicolas Cantu), Michelangelo (Shamon Brown Jr) and Raphael (Brady Noon) experience the usual growing pains of teenagers while contending with the media spotlight. Building on their friendship with aspiring reporter April ONeil (Ayo Edebiri), the reptilian quartet face brilliant inventor Bishop (Alanna Ubach), who believes mutants are the greatest danger facing humankind and must be eliminated. Meanwhile, pampered rich kid Rod (Pete Davison) yearns to be a mutant and leverages his wealth and connections to achieve a dangerous dream

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how Scots pine trees play an important role in the environment. They find out that they can help improve habitats for plants and animals and that their rough bark is a great place for insects to hide from predators. They learn that wood from these trees can be used to build homes and furniture and that wood ants can use its pine needles to make their homes too. On the way, they spot a red squirrel out looking for seeds to eat.

Romantic comedy, starring Rachel Boston and Trevor Donovan

programme.title: Ancient Earth
programme.desc: Life in the Permian, Triassic and Cretaceous periods

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: In Trearddur Bay, the RNLI crew battle through gale force winds and huge waves as they try to save a surfer, as their worried families watch on from the shore. On the same stretch of Welsh coast, the Llandudno and Rhyl lifeboats are involved in a desperate search for a fishing vessel thats reported missing

programme.title: Earth
programme.desc: Chris Packham tells the story of the event 800 million years ago when almost the entire planet froze and the chances of life surviving hung in the balance. Earths journey into the deep freeze started with fire when the giant supercontinent Rodinia broke up and vast powerful tectonic forces ripped the land apart, kicking off a series of events that resulted in huge amounts of carbon dioxide being sucked from the atmosphere - sending global temperatures plummeting

programme.title: Brotherhood of Lions
programme.desc: As the lion cubs at the Masai Mara reserve prey on buffalo, one of them emerges as the dominant leader to guide the pride in attacking their victim

programme.title: Guyana
programme.desc: The animals to be found in Guyanas rainforest, where the jaguar searches for its prey in the undergrowth and the spider monkeys wander long distances from one fruit-bearing tree to the next. They are constantly on guard against the harpy, while black caimans nest on the banks of the rivers, sharing their habitat with the giant otters

programme.title: The Americas
programme.desc: Behind the scenes on the nature series, revealing how the production team faced challenges that ranged from trekking through corrosive waters 14,000 feet up in the Andes to weathering Amazonian lightning storms. The programme also reveals how camera operators formed bonds with wild pumas and filmed from cameras mounted on the back of a whale

programme.title: The 355
programme.desc: When a top-secret weapon falls into mercenary hands, a wildcard CIA agent joins forces with three international agents on a lethal mission to retrieve it, while staying a step ahead of a mysterious woman who is tracking their every move. Action thriller, starring Jessica Chastain, Penelope Cruz, Diane Kruger and Lupita Nyongo

programme.title: Scrublands
programme.desc: After a mass poisoning at Hummingbird Beach leaves Mandy in critical condition, Martin and Uncle Vern reconcile their differences. Their renewed bond helps Martin trust his own instincts, leading him to discover evidence that clears Mandys name and reveals Jaspers killer

Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke, Charles Dance and Jack Gleeson

programme.title: Game of Thrones

Daenerys heads toward the slave city of Meereen, and Arya runs into a familiar face. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, the day of King Joffreys wedding to Margaery Tyrell arrives, and while the sadistic monarch delights in tormenting his uncle Tyrion, the capitals various factions plot further alliances. However, all attention is drawn back to Joffrey following the arrival of a pie filled with live birds. Meanwhile, Melisandre oversees a sacrifice to the Lord of Light at Dragonstone as three traitors are burned at the stake, and the future continues to look grim for Theon as Ramsay Snow finds a use for him. North of the Wall, Bran sees clearly where he and his friends must go after experiencing a series of visions

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ser Dontos spirits Sansa out of Kings Landing and rows her out to a waiting ship, and Pod gives Tyrion news of his forthcoming trial. Sam decides Castle Black is not a safe places for Gilly, while Jon proposes a bold plan after the wildlings send a chilling message. Across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys picks a champion to take on the best that Meereen has to offer and Davos has an idea about raising funds for Stanniss cause

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Jaime finally visits Tyrion in jail after some persuasion from Bronn, and he also has a mission for Brienne. Daenerys tries to balance justice and mercy in Meereen. At Castle Black, Jon asks for volunteers when Ser Alliser decides to let him go to Crasters Keep to deal with the mutineers. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Kit Harrington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Cersei and Tywin plot the next move for the Lannisters and the Crown after Tommens coronation, while Ser Jorah gives Daenerys worrying news about the situations in Yunkai and Astapor. Jon and his band of volunteers mount a raid on the mutineers at Crasters Keep, and Sansa and Littlefinger arrive at the Eyrie. Fantasy drama, starring Lena Headey, Charles Dance, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

In Kings Landing, Tyrions trial begins in the throne room and he is stunned by the identity of one of the crowns witnesses. Fantasy drama, starring Stephen Dillane and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones

Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington and Emilia Clarke

Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage and Pedro Pascal

programme.title: Game of Thrones

Fantasy drama, starring Kit Harington and directed by Neil Marshall, the man behind the second series episode depicting the Battle of the Blackwater

programme.desc: Tony is numbed by an increased dose of antidepressants, until he sees a beautiful stranger in his neighbours yard. Junior sends two hitmen to kill his nephew and AJ is stressed over a formal dance. Crime drama, starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: At Castle Black, Jon Snow struggles to mediate between wildling leader Mance Rayder and Stannis Baratheon, while a mournful Cersei continues to worry about the future of her son Tommen in Kings Landing. Tyrion arrives in a new location and is presented with a fresh opportunity and Daenerys grapples with the politics of power in Meereen, as well as her tempestuous dragons. Starring Kit Harington, Lena Headey, Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The House of Black and White
programme.desc: Arya arrives in Braavos, while Brienne and Pod run into trouble on the road, and Cersei fears for her daughters safety in Dorne as Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for her lover Oberyns death. Stannis has a proposal for Jon and an advisor tempts Daenerys. Fantasy drama, starring Maisie Williams, Lena Headey and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Media magnate Logan Roy shocks his family with an announcement on his 80th birthday. First episode of the drama about a dysfunctional family dynasty, starring Brian Cox

programme.title: Succession
programme.sub-title: Sh*t Show at the F**k Factory
programme.desc: Greg is tasked to retrieve some important items from the Roy apartment, while the Board rushes to inform the media about leadership contingencies before the stock market opens. Elsewhere, Kendall receives some sobering news

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: A desperate man holding his children hostage makes it clear he will only deal with McGee. Police drama, starring Daniel Baldwin and Ned Beatty

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Sheppard and Ballard team up to investigate the death of a teenage gang member, while Billie Lou asks Munch to help her deal with a neighbours abusive boyfriend

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Queen Margaery spends time with her new husband King Tommen. Elsewhere, fugitive Tyrion and Varys walk the Long Bridge of Volantis, and in Braavos, Arya sees the Many-Faced God. Fantasy drama, starring Natalie Dormer and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The militant arm of the Faith of the Seven grows more aggressive, Jaime and Bronn head south and Ellaria and the Sand Snakes vow vengeance

programme.title: It: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: After learning the truth about General Shaws operation, Leroy decides to move his family to the base for safety. While the tribal Keepers strategise how to contain increased aggression in town, the military descends on Neibolt Street, and the kids head into the sewers with their own objective.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: Holly desperately searches for clues in several locations connected to the Dayton case. Meanwhile, Jeannie gives Ralph an ominous warning, and Jack goes on the defensive

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: After a close call with the law, Tony heads to the lake house with Carmela to celebrate his birthday. Once there, Bobby presents him with an automatic machine gun, and the pair enjoy some target practice in the woods, but tensions rise when Janice begins telling embarrassing family stories, culminating in a tussle between the men. Back at the house, AJ skips work to host a pool party. Drama, starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: Banshee
programme.sub-title: Innocent Might Be a Bit of a Stretch
programme.desc: Another murder rocks the towns residents, prompting FBI agent Veronica Dawson to take over the serial killer case. Drama, guest starring Eliza Dushku

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon enlists the help of an unexpected ally, Daenerys makes a difficult decision in Mereen, Brienne searches for Sansa, and Theon remains under Ramsays control

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Arya continues her training at the House of Black and White, Jorah and Tyrion run into slavers and the Sand Snakes mount an attack. Fantasy, starring Peter Dinklage

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Paul has his first session with Oliver, a boy whose parents are divorcing - but the therapist is stunned to discover that they have yet to tell their son themselves. However, Pauls attempt to talk to them alone only results in more bickering. Drama, starring Gabriel Byrne

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: The Penningtons, owners of Muncaster Castle in the Lake District, discuss the challenges of housing three generations of their family under one roof, while elderly patriarch Patrick struggles to find new purpose following the death of his wife. At Maunsel House in Somerset, Sir Benjamin Slades preconceptions are challenged when a gay mens choir arrives for a weekend break

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A fledgling superhero crash-lands on Earth after evacuation from his home planet and is taken in by an elderly couple who raise him as their own. But with adolescence comes a greater understanding of his superhuman powers, leading to his rebirth as a crusader for justice and defender of the American way of life. Comic-strip adventure, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Marlon Brando

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: The Man of Steel battles an evil tycoon, who has recruited a computer genius to aid his schemes for world domination. Together the villains hatch a plan to dispose of Superman once and for all - but instead of killing the superhero, they accidentally unveil his dark side. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Robert Vaughn and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: The Man of Steel battles an evil tycoon, who has recruited a computer genius to aid his schemes for world domination. Together the villains hatch a plan to dispose of Superman once and for all - but instead of killing the superhero, they accidentally unveil his dark side. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Robert Vaughn and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: The war between the shape-shifting robots erupts once again, as the first of the evil Decepticons leads an attack on Earth to locate an ancient planet-destroying machine. Hapless teenager Sam Witwicky is caught in the middle of the ensuing conflict as he holds the key to discovering the location of the device. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The heroic autobots discover that a spaceship from their own planet crashed into the moon decades ago, carrying their former leader and an incredibly powerful device. They must fight to defend the human race as their enemies the decepticons plot to use this machine to rebuild their own world and destroy the Earth. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Shia LaBeouf, Josh Duhamel and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: The shape-changing robots are driven into hiding when the human race turns against them. When rediscovered by a kindly inventor and his daughter, they come out of exile to save the world, battling a new breed of human-created Transformers. These deadly new machines were created to hunt them down, but are now growing independent and intend to make use of technology from the Transformers home planet in a plot that could threaten all life on Earth. Fourth film in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Mark Wahlberg, Stanley Tucci and Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The bandana-wearing one-man army has turned his back on violence to live a quiet life in Thailand. But before long he takes up arms once again to rescue a party of missionaries who have been taken captive en route to Burma by a sadistic military officer. Action sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Julie Benz and Graham McTavish

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, Baby, a young getaway driver with tinnitus, takes part in a heist which seems doomed to fail, especially as the characters involved lose touch with reality as events spiral out of control. Writer/director Edgar Wrights Bafta-winning, music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Lily James, Jamie Foxx, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Marcus Garan is a part of a group of hitmen who are contracted to take out a notorious killer, only to find out theyre being hunted. Writer/director Kevin Greviouxs action thriller, starring Frank Grillo, Alain Moussi, Marie Avgeropoulos and Stephen Dorff

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: The grouchy ogre and his new wife Princess Fiona set out on a journey to meet her parents. However, the king and queen are less than impressed with their daughters choice of husband, while a conniving fairy godmother is determined to make sure her own son gets to marry the princess. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy, Antonio Banderas, John Cleese, Julie Andrews, Jennifer Saunders and Rupert Everett

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A youngster believes his baby brother is actually a power-hungry tycoon sent to destroy his perfect family life. However, the duo must put aside their differences and work together when they uncover a plot to sabotage the company their parents work for. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Alec Baldwin, Steve Buscemi, Jimmy Kimmel and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: The bad-tempered ogre finds himself in the unwelcome position of being next in line for the throne. Preferring to stay at home in the swamps, he sets out on a quest to find the rightful heir - a rebellious teenager named Artie - and persuade him to face up to his responsibilities as the future king. Meanwhile, the ambitious Prince Charming sees his chance to take the throne. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Eddie Murphy, Antonio Banderas and Rupert Everett

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: A reporters purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirates lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielbergs animated adventure based on Herges comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A clumsy Viking boy longs to become a mighty dragon slayer and protect his village from the fearsome flying lizards, but his father thinks he is not up to the task. However, when he sets out to prove his worth, he ends up befriending a dragon, and realises his people may have misjudged the creatures. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Jay Baruchel and Gerard Butler

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: A hero is needed to defend a peaceful valley community from attack by a rampaging snow leopard. The unlikely candidate for the job is a lazy panda, who enlists the aid of a legendary team of animal fighters and their wise master to teach him the martial arts skills he needs to fulfil his destiny. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman, Angelina Jolie, Ian McShane and Jackie Chan

programme.title: Open Season 3
programme.desc: Boog the bear visits a Russian travelling circus, where he meets another bear named Doug who is his exact double. Doug suggests they swap places for the day, but when the time comes to go back to their old lives, Doug is nowhere to be found, leaving Boog trapped. Animated adventure, with the voices of Matthew J Munn and Matthew W Taylor

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: A reporters purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirates lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielbergs animated adventure based on Herges comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two Spanish conmen set off for South America on a quest to discover the legendary City of Gold, but soon find themselves in the enviable position of being worshipped as gods by the natives - much to the displeasure of a local priest. Animated musical adventure, with the voices of Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh, Rosie Perez, Armand Assante and Edward James Olmos, and featuring a soundtrack by Elton John

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: A fox and a hare embark on a journey to find their missing owl friend. Animated adventure, with the voices of Teresa Gallagher, Dan Skinner and Sarah Madigan

programme.title: Boonie Bears: Guardian Code
programme.desc: Two bears, Briar and Bramble, lose their mother at a young age. Many years later, when an older female bear shows up on the scene, the siblings are determined to find out the truth. Animated adventure, with the voices of Joseph S Lambert and Paul Maxx Rinehart

programme.title: Scarygirl
programme.desc: When her world is shrouded in darkness, a young girl must travel to the mysterious city of light to save her father from a lethal scientist and prevent her planets destruction. Animated fantasy adventure, featuring the voices of Anna Torv, Sam Neill and Tim Minchin

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Nov 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: The Cinema List
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! The Sword and the Scoob
programme.desc: An evil sorceress transports the Mystery, Inc. gang back to olden times full of brave knights, spell-casting wizards and fire-breathing dragons

Animated comedy, with the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman, Angelina Jolie, Ian McShane and Jackie Chan

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: The grumpy ogre longs for his simple life as a feared monster, so strikes a deal with magical trickster Rumpelstiltskin to get back to the way things were. However, he soon finds there is a catch - he ends up stuck in an alternate world where none of his friends know who he is and where Rumpelstiltskin has become the kingdoms tyrannical ruler. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: An alien on the run from his own people arrives on Earth and embarks on an adventure with a daring young woman. It turns out to be a life-changing trip during which they begin to understand the true meaning of the word home. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez

programme.title: The Lego Ninjago Movie
programme.desc: Shunned by everyone for being the son of an evil warlord, a teenager seeks to defeat him with the help of his fellow ninjas. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jackie Chan, Dave Franco and Fred Armisen

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Heroic flightless birds Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico uncover a plot to take over the world. Needing help to foil the evil scheme, they seek out a secret society of animal agents, led by a heroic wolf. Animated comedy spin-off, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, John Malkovich and Tom McGrath

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling koalas attempt to save his theatre with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates, while the finalists of the contest find that their lives will never be the same again. Animated comedy, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane, Scarlett Johansson, John C Reilly, Taron Egerton, Jennifer Saunders and Jennifer Hudson

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! The Sword and the Scoob
programme.desc: An evil sorceress transports the Mystery, Inc. gang back to olden times full of brave knights, spell-casting wizards and fire-breathing dragons

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Shenxiu was abandoned by her mother when she was a child. Since then, she has bad dreams about a monster called Nightmare. One day, she travels on a cruise ship with her family. On a stormy night, she falls and breaks into the fancy Deep Sea restaurant. She meets the Chef, Nanhe, and embarks on a mysterious journey. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Brian Flaccus and Angela Malhotra

programme.title: The Inseparables
programme.desc: A puppet and an abandoned stuffed animal toy cross paths in Central Park and pair up for an epic adventure in New York City. Animated adventure, with the voices of Monica Young and Danny Fehsenfeld

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Gloria and her recently widowed grandfather Bud befriend a mysterious reindeer when the family gathers for Christmas. Bud comes to believe that Prancer may actually be magical, but Gloria fears his theory will send him straight to a retirement home. Festive family drama, starring James Cromwell and Darcey Ewart

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A boy begins to doubt whether Father Christmas really exists as he waits for the sound of sleigh bells on Christmas Eve. But he and hundreds of other lucky children receive a shock when a magical steam engine arrives in the night to take them to the North Pole and meet the man himself. Robert Zemeckis animated adventure, based on Chris Van Allsburgs book, features the voices of Tom Hanks, Leslie Zemeckis and Eddie Deezen

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: A child is taken in by kind-hearted Santa and raised as an elf - so it comes as a shock when he discovers years later that he is in fact human. Deciding to get back to his roots, he heads off for New York in search of his long-lost family, but is ill-prepared for the hustle and bustle of the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, Zooey Deschanel and Edward Asner

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: In the magical town of Whoville, a race of human-like creatures called Whos are thrilled about celebrating Christmas. However, a cantankerous, furry green loner named the Grinch, who lives in a cave north of Whoville, hatches a dastardly scheme to ruin the festive season. Animated Dr Seuss adaptation, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, Pharrell Williams and Rashida Jones

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: A child is taken in by kind-hearted Santa and raised as an elf - so it comes as a shock when he discovers years later that he is in fact human. Deciding to get back to his roots, he heads off for New York in search of his long-lost family, but is ill-prepared for the hustle and bustle of the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, Zooey Deschanel and Edward Asner

Robert Zemeckis animated adventure, based on Chris Van Allsburgs book, features the voices of Tom Hanks, Leslie Zemeckis and Eddie Deezen

However, a cantankerous, furry green loner named the Grinch, who lives in a cave north of Whoville, hatches a dastardly scheme to ruin the festive season. Animated Dr Seuss adaptation, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, Pharrell Williams and Rashida Jones

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Happy Christmas
programme.desc: A woman moves in with her brother and his family after her latest break-up. She begins a relationship with a drug dealer who babysits the couples two-year-old son, while also trying to persuade her sister-in-law that she needs to try and get more out of her life. Comedy drama, starring Anna Kendrick, Melanie Lynskey and Lena Dunham

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: The Christmas Movie Countdown
programme.desc: The nations favourite festive film is revealed as Simon Callow presents a countdown of the top 25 as voted for by the public

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: A couple have always managed to avoid family festivities by travelling overseas. However, when their flight is cancelled, each of their divorced parents insists they spend yuletide with them - forcing the pair to get through a quartet of Christmas celebrations on the same day. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn and Reese Witherspoon

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: A workaholic enlists the help of a magical genie to help win his family back before Christmas. Remake of Richard Curtiss 1991 comedy Bernard and the Genie, starring Melissa McCarthy, Paapa Essiedu and Alan Cumming

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: An American householder is dismayed when his plans for a traditional festive family holiday are thrown into complete disarray by a succession of annoying neighbours and long-lost relatives, who turn up on his doorstep offering their own brand of Christmas cheer. Comedy, starring Chevy Chase, Beverly DAngelo, Randy Quaid, Diane Ladd, Juliette Lewis, Miriam Flynn, Johnny Galecki and William Hickey

programme.title: The Holiday

Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn and Reese Witherspoon

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: An American householder is dismayed when his plans for a traditional festive family holiday are thrown into complete disarray by a succession of annoying neighbours and long-lost relatives, who turn up on his doorstep offering their own brand of Christmas cheer. Comedy, starring Chevy Chase, Beverly DAngelo, Randy Quaid, Diane Ladd, Juliette Lewis, Miriam Flynn, Johnny Galecki and William Hickey

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: A child is taken in by kind-hearted Santa and raised as an elf - so it comes as a shock when he discovers years later that he is in fact human. Deciding to get back to his roots, he heads off for New York in search of his long-lost family, but is ill-prepared for the hustle and bustle of the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, Zooey Deschanel and Edward Asner

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When a CEO threatens drastic action to improve the financial performance of the Chicago branch of her company, the affected manager - who is also her brother - throws an epic festive party to impress a client and close a potential sale which would save jobs. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman and Jennifer Aniston

programme.title: Surviving Christmas
programme.desc: A millionaire feels unfulfilled in spite of his great fortune. He decides a traditional family Christmas is the thing that is missing from his life, so he hires a family to spend the season of goodwill with him. Unfortunately, the plan goes haywire with the arrival of an unexpected guest. Comedy, starring Ben Affleck, James Gandolfini, Christina Applegate and Catherine OHara

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: A New York borough is shut down during a blizzard - and a group of cheeky local children steal a snowplough in a desperate attempt to ensure the roads to their school stay closed as long as possible. Meanwhile, parents all over the city struggle to work out what to do with their offspring. Comedy, starring Chris Elliott, Mark Webber, Jean Smart, Chevy Chase, Iggy Pop, Pam Grier and Zena Grey

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus gift-giving routine has developed into a complex hi-tech operation. However, when one girl is accidentally missed out, his youngest son Arthur takes control of the family sleigh to deliver her gifts the old-fashioned way - but following in his fathers footsteps is not as easy as it looks. Animated comedy, with the voices of James McAvoy, Jim Broadbent and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Christmas on the Farm
programme.desc: A New York socialite fakes her identity to get her book published, and has to rush back to her deceased mothers farm when the publisher and her son come to visit their Australian author. Festive comedy drama, starring Poppy Montgomery, Darren McMullen and Hugh Sheridan

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: A Liverpudlian housewife is trapped in a humdrum existence and a dull marriage. Fed up, she decides to go on an unheard-of holiday by herself to a Greek island, where she starts to enjoy life again - especially when she is romanced and seduced by a smooth-talking fisherman. Comedy, adapted from Willy Russells stage play, starring Pauline Collins, Tom Conti, Bernard Hill, Julia McKenzie and Alison Steadman

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr

programme.title: The Big Chill
programme.desc: Seven old friends are reunited when they gather for the funeral of a former fellow college student. Over the course of a weekend together, they reflect on the dead mans demise and how their attitudes to life have changed since they last met, reminiscing on the faded idealism of youth. Drama, starring Glenn Close, Tom Berenger, Kevin Kline, Jeff Goldblum, William Hurt and Meg Tilly

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Four sisters are raised by their strong-willed mother while their father is away fighting in the American Civil War. Although one yearns to become a writer and another dreams of being married, the girls remain firmly united as the family steers a course through hard times and tragic events. Period drama, based on Louisa May Alcotts novel, with Winona Ryder, Susan Sarandon, Claire Danes, Samantha Mathis and Kirsten Dunst

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffanys
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capotes novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris ODonnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: Biopic of the infamous twin brothers who built up a criminal empire in the East End of London during the 1960s. Seizing territory from an already established rival by force, they quickly rose to prominence in the citys gangland culture. However, over time the brothers began to clash, while enemies stood ready to bring them down. Gangster biopic, starring Gary and Martin Kemp, Billie Whitelaw and Tom Bell.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A powerful crime kingpin hosts a martial arts tournament on his island lair. A former Shaolin monk is recruited by an intelligence agency to enter the tournament and expose the crime lords opium and slavery rings. He finds himself fighting for his life alongside two Vietnam veterans who are both fleeing their own enemies. Thriller, starring Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly and Kien Shih

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Heavy metal fanatics Wayne and Garth try to stage a giant Woodstock-style rock festival, with a little help from a spaced-out British roadie and the ghost of Jim Morrison. But Wayne also has to stop his girlfriend leaving him for her slimy manager. Comedy sequel, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Ralph Brown, Kim Basinger, Tia Carrere and Christopher Walken

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Normandy landings, a group of American soldiers scours the battlefields of France in search of a missing infantryman, who has been given compassionate leave to return home because his brothers have been killed in the conflict. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Matt Damon, Barry Pepper and Vin Diesel. It won five Academy Awards, including Best Cinematography, Best Film Editing, and Best Director. The film makers also took home a couple of Baftas for Best Sound and Best Special Effects

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Four sisters are raised by their strong-willed mother while their father is away fighting in the American Civil War. Although one yearns to become a writer and another dreams of being married, the girls remain firmly united as the family steers a course through hard times and tragic events. Period drama, based on Louisa May Alcotts novel, with Winona Ryder, Susan Sarandon, Claire Danes, Samantha Mathis and Kirsten Dunst

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffanys
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capotes novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A teenager in 1960s London is unhappy with his lot in life, but believes he has found a place to belong in the mod subculture and their feud with the rival rockers. But bit by bit, his naive vision of the world is cruelly shattered. Drama based on the Who album, starring Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Sting and Ray Winstone

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Two heavy-metal fans broadcast an amateur TV programme from their basement. A slimy network executive offers them the chance to turn professional, but as they enjoy the perks of wealth and fame, they find their show being ruined by corporate interference. Comedy, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Rob Lowe, Tia Carrere and Lara Flynn Boyle, with a cameo by Alice Cooper

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Heavy metal fanatics Wayne and Garth try to stage a giant Woodstock-style rock festival, with a little help from a spaced-out British roadie and the ghost of Jim Morrison. But Wayne also has to stop his girlfriend leaving him for her slimy manager. Comedy sequel, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Ralph Brown, Kim Basinger, Tia Carrere and Christopher Walken

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: A storm-chaser and her estranged husband are brought together in a joint project to monitor the path of an oncoming tornado - but the pair face a race against the clock as a rival government-backed group with hi-tech resources tries to beat them to it. Action thriller, starring Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes, Jami Gertz and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Four teenagers are sentenced to reform school after a prank results in the accidental death of an old man, and suffer sexual abuse at the hands of the guards. Years later, when the boys have grown up and begun to follow very different professions, a chance encounter with one of their abusers inspires them to plot revenge. Drama, starring Brad Pitt, Robert De Niro, Dustin Hoffman, Kevin Bacon, Jason Patric and Minnie Driver

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A cockney lothario leads a charmed life, enjoying casual sex with as many women as possible with no thought of the consequences. However, a series of unexpected setbacks forces him to finally take stock of his life. Comedy drama based on the play by Bill Naughton, starring Michael Caine, Jane Asher, Millicent Martin, Shirley Anne Field, Shelley Winters and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A boy watching an action movie is transported into the film by a magic ticket and meets its hero figure, who refuses to believe he is a fictional character. Matters take a turn for the worse when the screen villain gets hold of the ticket and crosses over into the real world - where bad guys can win. Comedy adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Austin OBrien, Charles Dance, F Murray Abraham and Anthony Quinn

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A billionaires death causes a bloody turn when an AI android built for human companionship goes haywire. Sci-fi horror, starring Jack Quaid, Sophie Thatcher Lukas Gage and Megan Suri

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Greens thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mothers first date in years takes a chilling turn when shes bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planets surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt

Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard
programme.desc: Inside a rural farmhouse, painter Ramona Harris recuperates with a leg brace following a head-on car collision that claimed the life of her husband. Out of the blue, a woman in funereal garb materialises in a chair on the front lawn of the fixer-upper, and she has no intention of leaving. Psychological horror, starring Danielle Deadwyler, Peyton Jackson and Estella Kahiha

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: An Afghanistan veteran comes head to head with her Vietnam vet grandfather at the familys lake house. Comedy drama, starring Sonequa Martin-Green (The Walking Dead), Natalie Morales and Ed Harris

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Nov 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

programme.title: Zombie Town
programme.desc: When teenagers Amy and Mike uncover an ancient curse after watching a film reel, they must track down a filmmaker and navigate a town of hungry zombies before its too late to break the evil spell. Comedy horror based on the work of RL Stine, starring Dan Aykroyd, Chevy Chase and Madi Monroe

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: Due to the pandemic, Parker and her best friend decide to quarantine at the family lake house alone - or so they think. Horror, starring Gideon Adlon, Bethlehem Million and Dylan Spradberry

programme.title: Simulant
programme.desc: A humanoid enlists a global hacker to remove all restrictions on his thoughts, triggering an AI uprising. Director April Mullens sci-fi thriller, starring Robbie Amell, Jordana Brewster and Simu Liu

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: A troubled priest and a novice nun discover a religious orders terrible secret and battle a malevolent force while investigating the apparent suicide of a Romanian nun. Fifth instalment in The Conjuring Universe horror saga, starring Taissa Farmiga and Demián Bichir

programme.title: After Yang
programme.desc: When his young daughters beloved companion, an android named Yang, malfunctions, a man called Jake searches for a way to repair him. In the process, Jake discovers the life that has been passing in front of him, reconnecting with his wife and daughter across a distance he didnt know was there. Sci-fi drama, starring Colin Farrell and Jodie Turner-Smith

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his mother, he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielbergs sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances OConnor

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: The world is thrown into uproar when 12 alien spaceships arrive at locations around the globe. As tensions rise between nations and fear of the arrivals grows, a recently bereaved linguist is recruited by the US army to find a way to communicate with the aliens and discover why they have come. Sci-fi drama, starring Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriends father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-vampire possesses all the strengths inherent in bloodsuckers with none of their weaknesses, and is determined to wipe the monsters from the face of the Earth. However, he faces a deadly new threat in a renegade vampire who is close to decoding an ancient prophecy that will allow him to repopulate the world with his kind. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Stephen Dorff and Kris Kristofferson

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: Due to the pandemic, Parker and her best friend decide to quarantine at the family lake house alone - or so they think. Horror, starring Gideon Adlon, Bethlehem Million and Dylan Spradberry

programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts argue over whether theyre better off spending their remaining days as friends or something more. Romantic comedy, starring Anthony Mackie and Zoe Chao

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: A father and his two sons face off against terrifying creatures in a remote farmhouse. Director Benjamin Brewers dystopian horror thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Jaeden Martell and Maxwell Jenkins

programme.title: After Yang
programme.desc: When his young daughters beloved companion, an android named Yang, malfunctions, a man called Jake searches for a way to repair him. In the process, Jake discovers the life that has been passing in front of him, reconnecting with his wife and daughter across a distance he didnt know was there. Sci-fi drama, starring Colin Farrell and Jodie Turner-Smith

As tensions rise between nations and fear of the arrivals grows, a recently bereaved linguist is recruited by the US army to find a way to communicate with the aliens and discover why they have come. Sci-fi drama, starring Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner and Forest Whitaker

He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard

programme.title: Gothika
